metadata.title: CVE-2023-40551 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the MZ binary format in Shim. An out-of-bounds read mayoccur, leading to a crash or possible exposure of sensitive data during thesystem's boot phase.

criterions.comment: secureboot-db package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
shim-signed package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
shim package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
